H0.text: Which type of fish is used to make an Arbroath Smokie. Cod

H1.text: Which type of fish is used to make an Arbroath Smokie. Salmon

H2.text: Which type of fish is used to make an Arbroath Smokie. Plaice

H3.text: Which type of fish is used to make an Arbroath Smokie. Haddock

A4.text: The Arbroath smokie is a type of smoked haddock named after the town of Arbroath in Angus, Scotland.
